mapper.update: update project set project_name = #{projectName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, area_id = #{areaId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, project_contact_user_id = #{projectContactUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, project_create_user_id = #{projectCreateUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, project_owner_contact = #{projectOwnerContact,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, project_owner_contact_tel = #{projectOwnerContactTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, project_status = #{projectStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, project_create_time = #{projectCreateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, project_update_time = #{projectUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where project_id = #{projectId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select project_id, project_name, area_id, project_contact_user_id, project_create_user_id, project_owner_contact, project_owner_contact_tel, project_status, project_create_time, project_update_time from project where project_id = #{projectId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select project_id, project_name, area_id, project_contact_user_id, project_create_user_id, project_owner_contact, project_owner_contact_tel, project_status, project_create_time, project_update_time from project
